channel.title: Mapview applet
channel.description:
I've been working with RuneScape applets lately, and I started to work with mapview, but i couldn't deob it.
Anyone got the mapview source? I don't care if it's old or new, i just want something to work with.
I used popcorn's deobber, and it fuked up. :mad:
~Z[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 04:19:10 PM[/size][hr]I nearly got passapplet working properly, but I realized that most of it is serverside. <_<
~Z

item.title: Mapview applet
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:9, topic:104314”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=149236.msg1426931#msg1426931 date=1180910374]

[quote author=Zachera link=topic=149236.msg1422493#msg1422493 date=1180853358]
Hmm… well that’s decompiling it…

How would we go about deobfuscating it?

Basically turning the a.java, b.java into actual names like Class1.java, Applet_Sub1.java, etc.

~Z
[/quote]For the love of god, there is a signature feature in your profile, put ~Z in it…putting it at the end of your posts looks retarded =/

~Evil
[/quote]moparscape cm makes your posts look retarded[/quote]I know I had to see what everyone was talking about with the retarded posts

Read full topic

item.title: Mapview applet
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Zachera, post:3, topic:104377”]Hmm… well that’s decompiling it…

How would we go about deobfuscating it?

Basically turning the a.java, b.java into actual names like Class1.java, Applet_Sub1.java, etc.

~Z[/quote]I’m not a dunce, I know what I’m talking about. Lol :p.

[quote=“Zachera, post:4, topic:104377”]Lol. All 600 posts i’ve made on Rune-Server have that.

It’s a way of authentication. If I were to get hacked, the ~Z wouldn’t be placed there… and It’s sort of a habit… sorry.

Btw, thanks Krichevskoy.

~Z[/quote]This guy, bernard, has been doing it ever since he started RSCheating. (Which is over 4years approx.)

I just wouldn’t be able to do that… Lol.

@Krichevskoy, thanks buddy. I lost my old one, lol.

item.title: Mapview applet
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“Zachera, post:3, topic:104377”]Hmm… well that’s decompiling it…

How would we go about deobfuscating it?

Basically turning the a.java, b.java into actual names like Class1.java, Applet_Sub1.java, etc.

~Z[/quote]

No, that is deobfuscated.
It’s just not renamed

You want an old version of Zelix Klassmaster for that. There are several cracked ones floating around.
In fact, here’s one, apparently courtesy of TARC.

Here’s one of my rename scripts:

open "client.jar";
exclude *.client
        and *.signlink *(*)
        and *.* main(*);
unobfuscate;
saveAll archiveCompression=all ".";

And here’s the renaming part of my deob/rename script:

java -Xmx115m -jar lib/ZKM.jar unob.txt

Read full topic
